property.name: query
property.value: "SELECT {bsp.code} as serialProducts, {order:code} as code, {bsp.ocLocation} as ocLocation FROM {Consignment as c}, {ConsignmentEntry as ce}, {BlSerialProduct as bsp}, {ConsignmentStatus as cs}, {AbstractOrder as order} WHERE {ce:consignment} = {c.pk} AND {c.status} = {cs.pk} AND {cs.code} = 'READY_FOR_SHIPPING' AND {ce:serialProducts} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({bsp.pk},'%')) AND {c:order} = {order:pk} AND {order:actualRentalStartDate} >= ?actualRentalStartDate AND {c.warehouse} =?warehouse"

property.name: query
property.value: "SELECT {bsp.code} as serialProducts, {order:code} as code, {bsp.ocLocation} as ocLocation FROM {Consignment as c}, {ConsignmentEntry as ce}, {BlSerialProduct as bsp}, {ConsignmentStatus as cs}, {AbstractOrder as order} WHERE {ce:consignment} = {c.pk} AND {c.status} = {cs.pk} AND {cs.code} != 'READY_FOR_SHIPPING' AND {ce:serialProducts} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({bsp.pk},'%')) AND {c:order} = {order:pk} AND {order:actualRentalStartDate} >= ?actualRentalStartDate AND {c.warehouse} =?warehouse"

property.name: query
property.value: "SELECT {c.code} as consignmentCode, {order:code} as orderNumber,{order:rentalEndDate} as rentalEndDate, {serial.ocLocation} as ocLocation, {serial.code} as serialProductCode,{cs.code} as consignmentStatus, {order.consolidatedOrderNote} as orderNote FROM {Consignment as c} ,{AbstractOrder as order},{OrderTypeEnum as ot},{ConsignmentStatus as cs},{BlSerialProduct as serial},{ConsignmentEntry as ce} where {ce:consignment} = {c:pk} AND {ce:serialProducts} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({serial.pk},'%')) AND {c.order} = {order.pk} AND {order.orderType} = {ot.pk} AND {ot.code} = 'FD' AND {c.status} = {cs.pk} AND {order:actualRentalStartDate} >= ?actualRentalStartDate AND {c.warehouse} =?warehouse"

property.name: query
property.value: "SELECT {c.code} as consignmentCode, {order:code} as code, {order.rentalEndDate} as rentalEndDate FROM {Consignment as c}, {ConsignmentStatus as cs}, {AbstractOrder as order} WHERE {c.status} = {cs.pk} AND {cs.code} = 'READY_FOR_SHIPPING' AND {c:order} = {order:pk} AND {order:actualRentalStartDate} >= ?actualRentalStartDate AND {c.warehouse} =?warehouse"

property.name: query
property.value: "SELECT {orderItem:orderNumber} as orderNumber, {orderItem:orderType} as orderType, {orderItem:isVIPOrder} as isVIPOrder, {orderItem:isUsedGearOrder} as isUsedGearOrder, {orderItem:orderNotes} as orderNotes, {orderItem:productId} as productId, {orderItem:productName} as productName, {orderItem:productCount} as productCount, {orderItem:serialNumber} as serialNumber, {orderItem:parentLocation} as parentLocation, {orderItem:childLocation} as childLocation, {orderItem:shippingMethod} as shippingMethod, {orderItem:employeeName} as employeeName, {orderItem:shipDate} as shipDate FROM {ReadyToShipOrderItem as orderItem} WHERE {orderItem:warehouse} = ?warehouse"

property.name: query
property.value: "select {order:code} as orderNumber, {ot:code} as orderTypeFlag, {order.consolidatedOrderNote} as orderNotes, {b:name} as productName, {serial:code} as serialNumber, {serial:ocLocation} as ocLocationCode, {serial.dirtyPriorityStatus} as serialDirtyPriorityFlag from {BlProduct as b}, {Consignment as c}, {ConsignmentEntry as ce}, {BlSerialProduct as serial}, {AbstractOrder as order}, {OrderTypeEnum as ot}, {Warehouse as ware} where {ce:consignment} = {c:pk} and {ce:serialProducts} LIKE CONCAT(\'%\',CONCAT({serial.pk},\'%\')) and {serial.dirtyPriorityStatus} = 1 and {serial:blProduct} = {b.pk} and {c:warehouse} = {ware:pk} and {ware:pk} = ?warehouse and {c:optimizedShippingStartDate} = ?currentDate and {order:orderType} = {ot:pk}"

property.name: query
property.value: "SELECT {serial:code} as serialCode, {p:code} as prodCode, {p:name} as prodName, {ce:quantity} as prodQuantity, {order:orderType} as orderType, {order:code} as orderCode, {c:code} as consignmentCode, {serial:ocLocation} as locationCode, {dm:name} as shippingMethod, {order:consolidatedOrderNote} as consolidatedOrderNote FROM {Order AS order JOIN Consignment AS c ON {order.pk}={c.order} }, {BlSerialProduct as serial}, {ConsignmentEntry as ce}, {AbstractOrderEntry as oe}, {Product as p}, {Warehouse as wh}, {DeliveryMode as dm} WHERE {ce:consignment} = {c:pk} AND {ce:serialProducts} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({serial.pk},'%')) AND {oe:product} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({p.pk},'%')) AND {ce:orderEntry} = {oe.pk} AND {c:deliveryMode} = {dm.pk} AND {c:warehouse} = {wh.pk} AND {wh:pk} = ?warehouse AND {c:cleanCompleteConsignment} = 0 AND {c:optimizedShippingStartDate} = ?shipdate"

property.name: query
property.value: "SELECT {serial:code} as serialCode, {p:code} as prodCode, {p:name} as prodName, {ce:quantity} as prodQuantity, {order:orderType} as orderType, {order:code} as orderCode, {c:code} as consignmentCode, {serial:ocLocation} as locationCode, {dm:name} as shippingMethod, {order:consolidatedOrderNote} as consolidatedOrderNote FROM {Order AS order JOIN Consignment AS c ON {order.pk}={c.order} }, {BlSerialProduct as serial}, {ConsignmentEntry as ce}, {AbstractOrderEntry as oe}, {Product as p}, {Warehouse as wh}, {DeliveryMode as dm} WHERE {ce:consignment} = {c:pk} AND {ce:serialProducts} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({serial.pk},'%')) AND {oe:product} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({p.pk},'%')) AND {ce:orderEntry} = {oe.pk} AND {c:deliveryMode} = {dm.pk} AND {c:warehouse} = {wh.pk} AND {wh:pk} = ?warehouse AND {c:cleanCompleteConsignment} = 1 AND {c:optimizedShippingStartDate} = ?shipdate"
